Sentencas: Hematite (HEM) is a kind of cheap natural mineral with ion transport ability.
Titulo: Highly conductive hematite electrolyte for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: In this paper, some basic properties of HEM were studied to determine its potential as an electrolyte for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC).
Titulo: Highly conductive hematite electrolyte for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: A composite (HEM-GDC) formed by Gd0.1Ce0.9O2-delta (GDC) and HEM was developed to improve the performance of the HEM.
Titulo: Highly conductive hematite electrolyte for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The result of the X-ray fluorescence spectrometer confirms that the main components of HEM are Fe2O3 and SiO2.
Titulo: Highly conductive hematite electrolyte for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The X-ray diffraction (XRD) results show that the chemical compatibilities of HEM and HEM-GDC are good with La2NiO4 + delta (LNO) and NiO-yttria-stabilizedzirconia (NiO-YSZ).
Titulo: Highly conductive hematite electrolyte for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Moreover, the thermal expansion coefficients (TECs) of HEM and HEM-GDC are 11.83 x 10(-6) K-1 and 12.1 x 10(-6) K-1, permitting that they have good physical compatibility with Ni-yttria-stabilized zirconia (Ni-YSZ) and LNO.
Titulo: Highly conductive hematite electrolyte for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: According to the results of the differential scanning calorimetry with thermal gravimetric analysis (DSC-TGA), HEM and HEM-GDC are stable at high temperatures.
Titulo: Highly conductive hematite electrolyte for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The ionic conductivities of HEM and HEM-GDC are 1.07 x 10(-2)
Titulo: Highly conductive hematite electrolyte for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: S center dot cm(-1) and 7.23 x 10(-2)
Titulo: Highly conductive hematite electrolyte for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: S center dot cm(-1) at 450 degrees C, which meet the requirement of the low-temperature SOFC electrolytes.
Titulo: Highly conductive hematite electrolyte for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: In addition, electrochemical impedance spectra (EIS) tests of GDC, HEM, and HEM-GDC half-cell with LNO as cathode show that HEM-GDC performs best.
Titulo: Highly conductive hematite electrolyte for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cell
